description: A bunch of loose notes for researching bugs, which you're probably doing if you can see this.

name.str_pl: sets of forest magic research materials

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, bits of pressed leaves and flowers, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the natural world.

name.str_pl: sets of earth magic research materials

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, polished rocks and samples of soil, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the earth.

name.str_pl: sets of moon magic research materials

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, lunar observations, star charts, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the moon.

name.str_pl: sets of sky magic research materials

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, weather observations, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the sky.

name.str_pl: sets of sea magic research materials

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, tidal records, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the sea.
